{"id":1079005336,"question_id":525,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"7 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1697700901,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"22 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1079005336/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Contiguous Array","memory":"54.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int findMaxLength(int[] nums) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n\n        int cur = 0;\n        int max = 0;\n        HashMap<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();\n        map.put(0, -1);\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<len; i++){\n            int n = nums[i];\n\n            if(n==1) \n                cur++;\n            else \n                cur--;\n\n            if(!map.containsKey(cur)){\n                map.put(cur, i);\n            }else{\n                max = Math.max(max, i-map.get(cur));\n            }\n        }\n\n        return max;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"contiguous-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
